newsitem.title: ITALY: BCI 1996 CONS NET PROFIT 378 BILLION LIRE.
newsitem.headline: BCI 1996 CONS NET PROFIT 378 BILLION LIRE.

text.p: Italy's Banca Commerciale Italiana (BCI) on Monday said its 1996 consolidated net profit reached 378 billion lire compared to 365 billion lire and 329 billion lire in the two preceeding years.
